name: Catch the Apples
description:
Catch the Apples is a simple game. The move a basket on A and D. A = Left and D = Right. The goal is to keep going for as long time as possible and catch as many red apples as possible. If you miss a red apples or catch a brown a you will loose. Try to beat your own and your friends highscores ;)

http://gupasoftware.dk/games/CatchTheApples.html
